name: Network of European Regions Using Space Technologies
headAddress: c/o Representation of the State of Hessen to the EU, Rue Montoyer 21
goal:
NEREUS, Network of European Regions Using Space Technologies, is an initiative by regions from all over Europe, which share as Full Members its governance.

Emphasis is placed on the use of space technologies. The network aims to explore the benefits of space technologies for Regions and their citizens and to spread their applications.

NEREUS is a strong voice for the regional dimension of European Space Policy and programs as well as end-user needs.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Education and training, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
